name: The Color Codex
description:
In a world bleached of color, a hero must journey through an interesting landscape to find THE COLOR CODEX - a mystical book which will probably save the world, I hope.  In every level, you have to platform your way to a strange floating mass of oyster crackers, for unknown reasons, and make your way towards an ancient enemy.  Currently, there is only one world to explore, with 8 levels inside of it,  plus three extra ones, but there will be much more in future updates.  Oh, and by the way, this game is difficult.  Good luck!

If you find any bugs in the game that aren't already listed in the comments, please let me know.  Thank you!

Finally, some plans for the future: crouching, more platformer mechanics, big fixes, more/better music, more/better sfx, more plot, a title/settings screen, and the second world (the Arboretum).  Let me know what you want to see first!
